name: Basement Life
description:
[For better experience use Windows version]

Survive through the labyrinth with skillful shooting and jumping.

List of features and modifications:

Prefabs:

- Railing [model and texture]

-Floors, Walls and Ceiling [model and texture]

-Stairs [model and texture]

-Pipes [model and texture]

-Spinning Fans [model, texture, and animation]

-Floating Text [model]

-Dome [model and texture]

-Moving Platforms [model, texture, and CODE]

-Static Platforms [Model and Texture]

-Death Pit (player dies when fall down the bottom)

Levels:

-(2) Shooting and platforming  [level 1 and level2]

- Boss level

-Thank you level

Credits:

Music:

-Mr.ruiZ - Jamaica Jive

- Schizoïd Bass - Free Juke Box

-Schizoïd Bass - Garden under Storm

-Sunsearcher - Ambient Cool
